title: पाक पत्रकार ने जम्मू-कश्मीर में हाल की स्थिति बताकर पुरानी व् असंबद्ध तस्वीरें ट्वीट की
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: So are you proud of your gallantry in Kashmir? Shame and what a shame! Your brutal army kills innocent and unarmed Kashmiris. If this is ur benchmark of bravery and gallantry than we curse and curse on such a bravery. Don’t celebrate it rather feel ashamed and cry on it! https://t.co/uVASAJcDLmpic.twitter.com/OS8g2pKV41
